okama documentation¶

This is documentation.

Installation¶

pip install okama

-or-

pip install git+https://github.com/mbk-dev/okama

Class Overview¶

okama.Asset([symbol])

A financial asset, that could be used in a list of assets or in portfolio.

okama.AssetList([symbols, first_date, …])

The list of financial assets implementation.

okama.Portfolio([symbols, first_date, …])

Implementation of investment portfolio.
